comment: The best English professor I have had in a very long time. She comes off as a tough cookie but underneath it all she''s a wonderful educator and a really cool person. Definitely recommend this professor.

She's super nice teacher. Very helpful and cares a lot about her students. If you have the chance, take this course online. I am in her hybrid class and it is extremely easy. She can be really boring to listen to but that's why you take her class online. Her powerpoints are always very clear.
Mrs. Medved is a great professor! I recommend her online course 100% because she posts clear powerpoints about her expectations for the week and sends friendly email reminders.

Alright teacher. Attendence and participation mandatory.Midterm, final, and 5 formal writing assignments. She grades those pretty graciously. Reading quiz almost every class! They'll really bring you're participation grade down, so if you're not up for them i'd pick a different professor. Easy if you read, out of luck if you don't.

GREAT PROFESSOR! I heard World Lit was going to be so tough and being in a smaller class meant it would be much harder. WRONG. this professor made it clear what students need to do to pass with an A and it's beyond easy to do so! Lots of reading and writing but she's not a tough grader. TAKE HER she is so sweet and compassionate about what she does

You don't want to take this teacher. She isn't very clear with her assignments and doesn't help you when you get stuck. If you ask for help/assistance she begins to criticize you on why you don't understand. She requires a lot of work on your own time and if you fall behind she only blames it on you and doesn't help. She is very strict.

Prof. Medved is a very fair teacher. If you GO TO CLASS and complete your assignments, you can pretty easily make an A. Attendance is super important to her. She gives you tons of reference material and guidance and is always willing to help. If you do the work (which isn't too hard), you'll do just fine. I loved her!
This was an easy class she doesn't grade hard. I got a B without trying too hard and she is very sweet lady. I recommend her.

Overall an easy class if you do the work. Professor Medved does a good job of setting up the course so that all the papers build on one topic throughout the semester. Attendance is mandatory. The final was a 3-5 page argumentative essay on the topic of your choice. I would take Professor Medved again and recommend her class to others.

She grades really easy and the book is useless because she makes notes for the class online some test questions come from her notes. 3 papers to do all of which were easy. If you ask her to help and attend class everyday she'll pretty much correct everything and give it back for you to revise b4 turn in. Tests come mostly from the self assesments

She is an easy grader. She really does try to get the class to talk about the readings we have for homework. Try to participate. Attendance is mandatory. You have four major papers, all having to do with your one semester topic.
She is very nice and you will learn a ton. She grades essays quite easily and will really work with you to improve. I would definitely take her again.

If you are fresh out of AP Lang from High School, you should not take her. You will strive, but it will be very boring for you. She is the nicest lady and means well. You must go to class because she takes that into account. If she sees you attending every class, she'll like you a lot. Use attendance and participation in class to your advantage!

I have mixed feeling about her. She is EXTREMELY boring to listen too. But, she means well and is nice. As long as you put in the effort her class is easy. The book is probably the most boring book I've ever read though. She gives you reading noted to make up for it though. Not a bad teacher, but not the best either. I'd take her again if I had to.

very, very nice and encouraging (reminds me of my grandmother). but she is not clear on her essays what eactly she wants. i took it to the writing center for my first essay and they weren't sure either. shes also boring and repetitive and has a horrible sense of humor. not the BEST teacher, but a great person to talk to outside of class.

If all your other options are closed, she will be a safe class to take. Somewhat challenging. Takes alot of grades. She is a nice women and if you engage her she will like you and help you out. Remembers names well. Good class over all, just dont take it if you plan to slack off.

Attendance is mandatory, if you want a passing grade! Took the hybrid course, which made my schedule simpler. Her main assignments lead up to a presentation on your own, so the curriculum is organized. Good teacher, just boring lectures!
A very nice woman. Not very helpful when it comes to your grades. No study guides. No makeups. EVER!
Take her class for English 1102 if you can! She's a good professor, nice, approachable, and I find her voice to be very soothing.

A lot of assigned reading, but it is helpful.  Several short assignments and one research paper and presentation.  Online quizzes not difficult (I took the hybrid class).  Her grading is not harsh.  Mrs. Medved is a stickler for attendance, so be forewarned.  I found her to be very helpful when I had questions.  I recommend her to you!
Easy teacher, but attendence is mandatory. It hurt my grade. She is a very nice woman but sitting through an hour and 15 minutes of her lecturing is painful.
she is a very easy teacher as long as you come to class, and participate.
Took her Hybrid class and had an enjoyable time. She is such a nice woman and is willing to help whenever possible. Just do your assignments and show some effort and an A will be pretty sustainable!
Class was easy... I took her hybrid. Class is mandatory, but everything she says in class you can find online.

Took the hybrid course with her. I didn't find it difficult at all as long as you put an effort forth. All quizzes except one were online so they were easy grades. I didn't miss a class, but I don't think if you did it would hurt you as long as you put the writing effort in on your own. Writing Lab was a great help.

I have always found writing papers easy.  Mrs. Medved makes it a little more challenging.  She does not tolerate ignorance or people forgetting about assignments or not knowing the material.  Does random reading quizzes in class. Four papers, a midterm, final, and lots of busy work
Professor Medved is really a nice lady. I was in a hybrid course and she gave way too much busy work through the week. If you don't like to work, don't take her. Also attendance is mandatory.

Very fair, nice, organized.  She is strict but fair. Heavy workload though, not sure how that compares to others. Extremely detailed, no excuse for not knowing what you are supposed to do. If you need someone to hold your hand and MAKE you read your instructions for assignments then don't take the class.

Michele perhaps knows what to do to write a paper, but she makes it difficult to understand something very simple. She also gives her students so much homework, especially reading, that it's hard to concentrate on what's important.
She was a really nice teacher. Assignments were a bit rigorous but she makes sure you do well. I would recommend her
It just seemed like she would sneak things into the class without us really knowing what all was going on
Hybrid Course, Clear Guidlines, Rigorous Course With Many Assignments, Helpful Prof. Keeps You Informed, Stay On Top of Work!
Online course.  Highly organized, clear expectations.  Very good teacher, very responsive.

She was a good teacher. You are required to keep up with your work because she doesn't remind you when things are due but the assignments are all pretty easy, so I definitely recommend taking a class from her.

She's really good. She gives a lot of different ways to earn points. Also provides an excellent foundation for writing skills to be developed. She's very balanced and sweet...but firm. Really glad I had her!

Prof. Medved is kinda tough, and the class is rigorous, but if you can just keep up with the assignments and do them well, you will get an A. You only have to study for the midterm, and then the final is a paper, so you don't have to study for it. She takes the class seriously, explains in adequate detail, and is a nice lady overall.

Great Teacher.  Strictly there to teach but understands the tale of a struggling college student.  With the right attitude she will work with you.  Pay Attention and hand in everything on time and you will receive a B
She was a good teacher although you have to be on her good side. Attendance is mandatory and she doesnt like tardiness. Dont be loud or ask too many questions, she likes sitting ducks.

Absolutely a wonderful teacher. I had her for Eng1102, and she was fantastic. Though you do have to attend, she was more than willing to help in any way possible. The midterm and final were only 5% of our grade and it was super easy. She's very clear about the assignments and is a real pleasure to be around. One of the best teachers I've had!

Attend class, do the work you will do fine.  Very organize teacher. This teacher does not put up with slackers or students with a lot of sorry excuses for missing class. Be perpared for class and you will do just fine.  Do not be afraid to ask for help when you need it.
i loved her.She was a great teacher, but you do have to be on her good side. She loves when you answer her questions.

I really liked her a lot. She is a english teacher that not to strict, but does have criteria expectations you should follow. Be nice, sit in the front, and chat with her. She does give the pop quizzes which are mainly from handouts given. Keep up with notebook assignments also.

Definately have to get on her good side to make an A in her class. It's not a hard class but you do have to show up. She's big on attendance she will mark you tardy too. Do read the assignments cause she does give pop quizzes. 4 writing assignments aren't that bad and final is a revisement of a paper you already wrote.

I found her difficult to get along with, in my opinion, because I am male and not a brown-noser. She will not go over assignments or what was covered in class-your responsibility; and will not accept late assignments. I missed the second class and had no chance to regain since there is a specific first sentence structure, which she wouldn't go over

Very easy.  Syllabus is day-by-day and there's nothing spontaneous.  Few quizzes.  Just do the homework (summary/response essays usually) and the class will be a breeze.  Oh- and she makes the research paper SUPER easy and is very lenient in grading it (and everything else).  Take her.
Very nice person - never seen her mad. A little boring sometimes though. Easy class as long as you do your work.
i hated her. she seems real nice if you are a suck up but if you arent... dont even think about it. i came but didnt suck up... hated my guts. i withdrew before it was too late. GOOD LUCK

There's going to be a lot of work if you decide to take this class, but Mrs. Medved is extremely nice, organized, and understanding. She'll try her best to help you if you have any questions. A great person, but don't expect to get a good grade if you're a slacker!

i absolutely loved medved. shes very clear and understanding. she wants her students to do well and shows great empathy. i highly recommend her. she is a great help. attendence is important tho and she only gave one pop quiz the entire semester. everything else had a date and she even accepted extra credit if you provided her with a good reason.
A great teacher & very professional.  Taught me things I didn't know  & should've.  If you do the work & ask for help, you'll do fine.
Attendence is important in this class. Students who do not feel they have to go to class should not take this course. I learned a lot from this teacher.  I would recomend this teacher to my friends.

This class reminded me of highschool. She is VERY strict about attendance and about keeping up your notebook. She likes people who kiss up. Basically, your grade is based on 4 papers and pop quizzes on tons of reading. She is very boring. Basiclly a waste of a semester with her teaching it.

completely unprofessional... made nothing below a 92 in the class, yet failed because I was late to class 5 times... apparently she counts lates as abscences- therefore, a letter grade.... VERY STRICT ATTENDANCE... boring class...12 page research paper, 1 6 pg narrative, 1 8 pg argumentative...dont take her! shes evil!!
sucks

She is very NICE and very HELPFUL! She grades pretty easy and very organized which I really liked. Sometimes give reading quizzes after the reading assg, and you have to read textbook a lot, but it's an easy A and I HIGHLY recommend that you take her :)
HORRIBLE
Boring as ever!!! Biased on grading papers, loves presentations and the sound of her own voice.
No Comments

If you aren't the type of person to suck up then you are out of luck with this professor.  She picks favorites (especially boys) and does not care to help others.  I would not take this class if you want to feel like you are in middle school.

Very strict on attendance....just show up to class. Very helpful and just all around a nice woman. She does not grade too hard...just follow the syllabus..In 1101 I got a C and in this I am pretty sure I am getting an A.
She is very strict about attendance, and you can only miss a few days before she lowers your grade. She is very easy and willing to help. If you don't mind going to class, I definately recommend.

Wow- what a great teacher. She is very motivating and helpful. Try your best in this class and she will remeber that at the end of the course. Just make sure not to miss any classes. Very srtict on attendance.

She has a very strict attendance policy. If you're late.. You're considered absent.. Not very lenient. Your grade goes down as you up the absences... All grades are based on papers and reading quizzes.. Make sure you read ALL of the little footnotes..
